Title: Trouble Is Bad
Writer: Douglas Adams (based upon the novels by), Max Landis (created for television by), Max Landis, Molly Nussbaum, Sinead Daly (executive story editor), Molly Nussbaum (story editor)
Actors: Samuel Barnett, Elijah Wood, Hannah Marks, Fiona Dourif
Plot: Wendimoor is in case. The Mage casts his final solution putting both worlds in jeopardy. Todd and Amanda must put aside their differences and work together.
